description:
Highly functional gloves made with shaped leather on the palms and fingers, and windproof, water-resistant nylon. They use old-world craftmanship and high-quality materials. The midweight fleece liners can be swapped out, so they span a wide range of conditions. Premium gloves that are designed for those who live for winter and seasons that span 100+ days. The entry price may be steep, but these are built for discerning individuals who seek a top-of-the-line glove.

  • Windproof, water-resistant breathable HESTRA 3-layer polyester blend
  • Fingers and palms are supple and durable Army goat leather
  • Removable liner is made of soft Bemberg polyester fleece with warm G-loft synthetic insulation
  • Ergonomic design uses pre-curved fingers for a close fit and a more comfortable grip
  • Adjustable wrist strap with a stretchy neoprene panel at the cuff
  • Hang loops on ring fingers to hang upside down to keep the snow out
  • Wrist leash keeps the gloves with you during those unexpected ejections
name: Hestra Army Leather Patrol Gloves - Unisex
